Maize (Mahindi).description: Kenya's primary staple crop. Requires well-drained, fertile soils and deep root penetration.
Maize (Mahindi).seedbed_prep: Clear the land of previous crop residues. Do not burn the residue; instead, incorporate it into the soil to improve organic matter.
Maize (Mahindi).primary_prep: Deep Plowing (15-20cm deep) using a disc plow or ox-plow. This is critical to break the hardpan, allowing the deep taproots of maize to access moisture during dry spells.
Maize (Mahindi).secondary_prep: Harrowing to achieve a medium tilth. Maize does not require a very fine seedbed, but clods should be broken down.
Maize (Mahindi).tertiary_prep: Ridging and Furrowing. Create furrows 75cm apart. Plant seeds 30cm apart within the row. Apply DAP fertilizer.

Beans (Maharagwe).description: A crucial legume for food security and nitrogen fixation in the soil.
Beans (Maharagwe).seedbed_prep: Select a well-drained field. Beans are highly susceptible to root rot in waterlogged soils.
Beans (Maharagwe).primary_prep: Moderate Plowing (10-15cm). Turn the soil to bury weeds. Apply agricultural lime if soil is highly acidic.
Beans (Maharagwe).secondary_prep: Harrowing to a FINE tilth. Because bean seeds push out of the soil, a fine, loose seedbed is strictly required.
Beans (Maharagwe).tertiary_prep: Planting on flat seedbeds or shallow ridges. Spacing should be 45cm between rows and 15cm between plants.

Potatoes (Viazi Mbatata).description: A major cash and food crop in cooler regions like Nyandarua and Meru.
Potatoes (Viazi Mbatata).seedbed_prep: Ensure the field has not been planted with tomatoes or capsicum in the last season to prevent bacterial wilt.
Potatoes (Viazi Mbatata).primary_prep: Deep plowing (20cm) is essential to allow tuber expansion.
Potatoes (Viazi Mbatata).secondary_prep: Harrow to a medium tilth. Avoid overly fine soil which can cause waterlogging.
Potatoes (Viazi Mbatata).tertiary_prep: Create deep ridges. Plant sprouted tubers 30cm apart. Apply NPK fertilizer and cover with soil.

Sorghum (Mtama).description: A highly drought-resistant cereal, excellent for arid and semi-arid areas.
Sorghum (Mtama).seedbed_prep: Clear all grassy weeds completely as young sorghum struggles to compete.
Sorghum (Mtama).primary_prep: Plow early before the onset of rains to allow weeds to dry and die off.
Sorghum (Mtama).secondary_prep: Harrowing to an EXTRA FINE tilth. Sorghum seeds are very small; large clods will bury them too deep.
Sorghum (Mtama).tertiary_prep: Plant in shallow furrows (2.5cm deep). Spacing is 60cm by 20cm.

Cassava (Muhogo).description: A hardy root tuber known for its resilience in poor soils and dry conditions.
Cassava (Muhogo).seedbed_prep: Clear bushes and small tree stumps.
Cassava (Muhogo).primary_prep: Plow deeply to loosen the soil for root penetration.
Cassava (Muhogo).secondary_prep: Minimal harrowing needed. Soil can remain relatively cloddy.
Cassava (Muhogo).tertiary_prep: Create large mounds or ridges. Plant 30cm cuttings at a 45-degree angle, spacing them 1m by 1m.

Tomatoes (Nyanya).description: A high-value horticultural crop requiring intensive management.
Tomatoes (Nyanya).seedbed_prep: Start in a nursery bed. Sterilize nursery soil using solarization or heat.
Tomatoes (Nyanya).primary_prep: Main field requires deep plowing to incorporate well-rotted manure.
Tomatoes (Nyanya).secondary_prep: Harrow to a fine tilth. Construct raised beds if the area is prone to flooding.
Tomatoes (Nyanya).tertiary_prep: Transplant seedlings at 4 weeks. Spacing is 60cm by 45cm. Provide staking structures immediately.

Cabbage (Hoho/Kabeji).description: A popular leafy vegetable that thrives in cooler, moist conditions.
Cabbage (Hoho/Kabeji).seedbed_prep: Establish a nursery bed. Protect seedlings from heavy rain and direct sun.
Cabbage (Hoho/Kabeji).primary_prep: Plow and incorporate a heavy dose of organic farmyard manure.
Cabbage (Hoho/Kabeji).tertiary_prep: Transplant seedlings. Spacing is 60cm by 60cm for large varieties. Keep the soil consistently moist.

Onions (Vitunguu).description: A profitable bulb crop requiring specific day-length and dry conditions for harvesting.
Onions (Vitunguu).seedbed_prep: Sow seeds in a fine-tilted nursery bed. Thin out weak seedlings.
Onions (Vitunguu).primary_prep: Plow to a moderate depth. Onions have shallow root systems.
Onions (Vitunguu).secondary_prep: Harrow to a very fine tilth to ensure good root establishment.
Onions (Vitunguu).tertiary_prep: Transplant at pencil-thickness. Space 30cm between rows and 10cm between plants. Do not plant too deep.

Sweet Potatoes (Ngwaci).description: A vital food security crop, high in Vitamin A, especially the orange-fleshed varieties.
Sweet Potatoes (Ngwaci).seedbed_prep: Clear existing vegetation. Avoid waterlogged areas.
Sweet Potatoes (Ngwaci).primary_prep: Deep plowing to turn the soil.
Sweet Potatoes (Ngwaci).secondary_prep: Harrowing is necessary to break down large clods.
Sweet Potatoes (Ngwaci).tertiary_prep: Construct very high ridges or mounds (30-40cm high). Plant disease-free vines horizontally.

Green Grams (Ndengu).description: A fast-maturing legume that performs well in drylands.
Green Grams (Ndengu).seedbed_prep: Clear land and wait for the first rains.
Green Grams (Ndengu).secondary_prep: Harrow to a fine tilth for the small seeds.
Green Grams (Ndengu).tertiary_prep: Plant 45cm between rows and 15cm between plants. Ensure soil is moist during planting.

Cowpeas (Kunde).description: Grown for both its nutritious leaves and seeds. Highly drought tolerant.
Cowpeas (Kunde).seedbed_prep: Basic land clearing. Can be intercropped with maize.
Cowpeas (Kunde).tertiary_prep: Plant seeds 2-3cm deep. Spacing depends on whether it is grown for leaves (closer) or grain (wider).

Kales (Sukuma Wiki).description: The most widely consumed vegetable in Kenya.
Kales (Sukuma Wiki).primary_prep: Plow and add massive amounts of manure/compost.
Kales (Sukuma Wiki).tertiary_prep: Transplant at 4 weeks. Spacing is 60cm by 60cm. Apply CAN fertilizer 3 weeks after transplanting.

Groundnuts (Njugu Karanga).description: A valuable cash crop requiring loose, sandy-loam soils for pegging.
Groundnuts (Njugu Karanga).seedbed_prep: Select light soils. Heavy clays prevent the nuts from developing underground.
Groundnuts (Njugu Karanga).secondary_prep: Harrow to an extremely fine, loose tilth.
Groundnuts (Njugu Karanga).tertiary_prep: Plant seeds 5cm deep. Spacing is 45cm by 15cm. Do not weed once the plants start flowering (pegging stage).

Bananas (Ndizi).description: A perennial crop serving as both a fruit and a staple food.
Bananas (Ndizi).seedbed_prep: Select a site protected from strong winds.
Bananas (Ndizi).primary_prep: Plow the general area, though spot preparation is more common.
Bananas (Ndizi).secondary_prep: Not strictly necessary for the whole field.
Bananas (Ndizi).tertiary_prep: Dig large holes (60cm x 60cm x 60cm). Mix topsoil with manure. Plant healthy suckers or tissue-culture plantlets.

Carrots (Karoti).description: A root vegetable demanding deep, loose soil.
Carrots (Karoti).seedbed_prep: Select a field free of stones and hardpans.
Carrots (Karoti).primary_prep: Plow extremely deep. Do NOT use fresh manure as it causes root forking.
Carrots (Karoti).secondary_prep: Harrow to an exceptionally fine tilth.
Carrots (Karoti).tertiary_prep: Sow seeds directly into shallow drills 30cm apart. Thin out seedlings to 5cm apart to allow root growth.

Wheat (Ngano).description: A major cereal crop mostly grown in large scale in Rift Valley.
Wheat (Ngano).seedbed_prep: Clear the land of any previous cereal stalks to prevent disease carryover.
Wheat (Ngano).primary_prep: Deep plowing using a disc or chisel plow to bury weeds.
Wheat (Ngano).secondary_prep: Harrow to a fine, firm tilth. A firm seedbed is crucial for uniform germination.
Wheat (Ngano).tertiary_prep: Use a seed drill for planting at 3-5cm depth. Apply basal fertilizer containing Phosphorus during planting.

Rice (Mchele).description: A highly consumed grain, heavily reliant on irrigation like in Mwea.
Rice (Mchele).seedbed_prep: Establish a wet nursery bed. Soak seeds for 24 hours before broadcasting in the nursery.
Rice (Mchele).primary_prep: Puddling: Plow the field while flooded to create an impermeable hardpan that holds water.
Rice (Mchele).secondary_prep: Level the flooded field perfectly using a leveling board drawn by oxen or tractor.
Rice (Mchele).tertiary_prep: Transplant seedlings at 3-4 weeks old into the muddy field, spacing 20cm by 20cm.

Sugarcane (Miwa).description: A major cash crop in Western and Nyanza regions.
Sugarcane (Miwa).seedbed_prep: Clear all vegetation. Ensure the field has good drainage as sugarcane dislikes waterlogging.
Sugarcane (Miwa).primary_prep: Deep plowing (up to 30cm) to allow the massive root system to establish.
Sugarcane (Miwa).secondary_prep: Harrow once or twice to break large clods.
Sugarcane (Miwa).tertiary_prep: Dig deep furrows (trenches) 1.2m to 1.5m apart. Plant healthy cane 'setts' (cuttings) end-to-end inside the trench.

Tea (Majani Chai).description: Kenya's top foreign exchange earner, grown in high-altitude, acidic soils.
Tea (Majani Chai).seedbed_prep: Clear forest or old tea bushes. Do not burn vegetation as it raises soil pH (tea needs acidic soil).
Tea (Majani Chai).primary_prep: Deep plowing or ripping to break any hardpan.
Tea (Majani Chai).secondary_prep: Level the land and plant shade trees (like Grevillea) and windbreaks.
Tea (Majani Chai).tertiary_prep: Dig holes 45cm deep. Plant vegetatively propagated clones. Space 1.2m by 0.6m.

Coffee (Kahawa).description: A major export cash crop preferring volcanic soils and cool climates.
Coffee (Kahawa).seedbed_prep: Establish a shaded nursery for seedlings. Seeds take up to 2 months to germinate.
Coffee (Kahawa).secondary_prep: Mark out the field. Construct terraces on steep slopes to prevent erosion.
Coffee (Kahawa).tertiary_prep: Dig planting holes 60cm wide and 60cm deep. Mix topsoil with phosphate fertilizer and well-rotted manure before planting.

Cotton (Pamba).description: A fiber cash crop thriving in warm, semi-arid regions.
Cotton (Pamba).seedbed_prep: Clear land immediately after the previous harvest to destroy cotton stainers.
Cotton (Pamba).primary_prep: Plow to a moderate depth to bury crop residues.
Cotton (Pamba).tertiary_prep: Plant 3-4 seeds per hole at 90cm by 30cm spacing. Thin to 2 plants per hole after emergence.

Pyrethrum (Pireto).description: A flower crop used to produce natural insecticides.
Pyrethrum (Pireto).seedbed_prep: Clear weeds entirely. Pyrethrum is highly sensitive to weed competition.
Pyrethrum (Pireto).secondary_prep: Harrow to a fine, clean tilth.
Pyrethrum (Pireto).tertiary_prep: Plant vegetative splits (splits from mature, healthy plants) 60cm by 30cm apart on raised ridges.

Macadamia Nuts.seedbed_prep: Purchase grafted seedlings from certified nurseries only.
Macadamia Nuts.primary_prep: Clear the field and mark planting spots.
Macadamia Nuts.tertiary_prep: Dig large holes (60cm x 60cm). Space trees 7m by 7m to allow canopy expansion.

Avocado (Parachichi).description: A rapidly growing export fruit crop, notably the Hass variety.
Avocado (Parachichi).seedbed_prep: Select a well-drained site. Avocados are highly prone to root rot (Phytophthora).
Avocado (Parachichi).primary_prep: Clear land and rip the soil if a hardpan exists.
Avocado (Parachichi).tertiary_prep: Dig holes 60cm deep. Space 5m by 5m. Mix topsoil with manure and plant grafted seedlings.

Mangoes (Maembe).description: A popular fruit crop, especially in Eastern and Coastal Kenya.
Mangoes (Maembe).tertiary_prep: Dig large holes. Spacing varies from 8m x 8m to 10m x 10m depending on the variety.

Passion Fruit (Matunda ya Mateso).description: A climbing vine producing high-value fruits.
Passion Fruit (Matunda ya Mateso).seedbed_prep: Erect strong trellises (wire fences) for the vines to climb before planting.
Passion Fruit (Matunda ya Mateso).primary_prep: Plow the area between the intended trellis rows.
Passion Fruit (Matunda ya Mateso).tertiary_prep: Plant grafted seedlings at the base of the trellis posts, spacing 3m apart.

Pineapples (Matunda ya Mananasi).description: A tropical fruit crop suited for warm, lower altitudes.
Pineapples (Matunda ya Mananasi).seedbed_prep: Use suckers, slips, or crowns from healthy parent plants.
Pineapples (Matunda ya Mananasi).primary_prep: Deep plowing. Excellent drainage is non-negotiable.
Pineapples (Matunda ya Mananasi).tertiary_prep: Plant in double rows. Space 30cm between plants and 60cm between double rows. Use black plastic mulch if possible.

Pawpaw / Papaya (Papai).description: A fast-growing, short-lived tropical fruit tree.
Pawpaw / Papaya (Papai).seedbed_prep: Start seeds in polythene tubes in a nursery.
Pawpaw / Papaya (Papai).tertiary_prep: Plant 3 seedlings per hole (to ensure at least one female/hermaphrodite plant later). Space 3m by 3m.

Watermelon (Tikiti Maji).description: A trailing vine crop that requires warm temperatures and lots of space.
Watermelon (Tikiti Maji).seedbed_prep: Clear land and wait for soils to warm up.
Watermelon (Tikiti Maji).primary_prep: Plow deeply to encourage deep rooting.
Watermelon (Tikiti Maji).tertiary_prep: Plant 2-3 seeds per hole on raised beds or mounds. Space widely at 2m by 1m.

Pumpkins (Maboga).description: A resilient vine crop grown for fruit and nutritious leaves.
Pumpkins (Maboga).tertiary_prep: Plant on mounds. Incorporate heavy compost into the mound before planting seeds.

French Beans (Mishiri).description: A major export vegetable requiring intensive care.
French Beans (Mishiri).seedbed_prep: Ensure irrigation infrastructure is in place before planting.
French Beans (Mishiri).secondary_prep: Harrow to a very fine tilth to ensure uniform germination.
French Beans (Mishiri).tertiary_prep: Sow seeds directly. Space 30cm between rows and 15cm between plants. Install supporting strings.

Snow Peas (Njegere).description: A high-value export crop thriving in cooler climates.
Snow Peas (Njegere).tertiary_prep: Sow seeds directly. Provide stakes or trellises immediately as they are climbing vines.

Garden Peas (Minji).description: A popular local vegetable grown in cooler highlands.
Garden Peas (Minji).seedbed_prep: Clear land of previous crop residues.
Garden Peas (Minji).tertiary_prep: Sow seeds in shallow drills 45cm apart.

Capsicum / Bell Peppers (Pilipili Hoho).description: A widely used vegetable that performs well in greenhouses and open fields.
Capsicum / Bell Peppers (Pilipili Hoho).seedbed_prep: Start seeds in a nursery tray or bed.
Capsicum / Bell Peppers (Pilipili Hoho).primary_prep: Deep plow and apply well-rotted manure.

Chilies (Pilipili Kali).description: A hot pepper crop, highly resistant to many pests.

Garlic (Kitunguu Saumu).description: A high-value spice crop with long maturity time.
Garlic (Kitunguu Saumu).seedbed_prep: Break bulbs into individual cloves for planting. Do not peel the cloves.
Garlic (Kitunguu Saumu).primary_prep: Deep plow to loosen soil for bulb expansion.
Garlic (Kitunguu Saumu).secondary_prep: Harrow to an extremely fine tilth.
Garlic (Kitunguu Saumu).tertiary_prep: Plant cloves pointed-side up, 3cm deep. Space 30cm by 10cm.

Ginger (Tangawizi).seedbed_prep: Use healthy rhizome pieces (setts) with at least one bud.
Ginger (Tangawizi).primary_prep: Deep plow and apply heavy organic matter.
Ginger (Tangawizi).tertiary_prep: Plant setts 5cm deep on raised beds. Mulch heavily immediately after planting.

Coriander (Dania).description: A fast-growing herb used for garnishing.
Coriander (Dania).seedbed_prep: Split the round seeds into two halves before sowing to improve germination.
Coriander (Dania).secondary_prep: Harrow to a very fine tilth.
Coriander (Dania).tertiary_prep: Broadcast seeds or drill in shallow rows 30cm apart.

Spinach (Mchicha).seedbed_prep: Start in a nursery or sow directly.
Spinach (Mchicha).tertiary_prep: If direct sowing, thin plants to 15cm apart.

Amaranth (Terere).description: A highly nutritious, drought-tolerant indigenous vegetable.
Amaranth (Terere).secondary_prep: Harrow to an extra-fine tilth because the seeds are microscopic.
Amaranth (Terere).tertiary_prep: Mix seeds with dry sand before broadcasting to ensure even distribution.

Spider Plant (Saga / Saget).tertiary_prep: Broadcast seeds or sow in drills 30cm apart.

Nightshade (Managu).seedbed_prep: Establish a nursery. Seeds take long to germinate.
Nightshade (Managu).tertiary_prep: Transplant seedlings at 4 weeks. Space 30cm by 30cm.

Arrowroots (Nduma).description: A traditional root tuber grown in wetlands or river valleys.
Arrowroots (Nduma).seedbed_prep: Select swampy or highly moist areas.
Arrowroots (Nduma).primary_prep: Deep digging using jembes. Avoid tractors in marshy areas.
Arrowroots (Nduma).tertiary_prep: Dig deep trenches. Plant suckers inside the trench and cover lightly.

Yams (Viazi Vikuu).description: A climbing tuber crop requiring deep soils.
Yams (Viazi Vikuu).seedbed_prep: Cut mature tubers into setts and dip in ash to prevent rotting.
Yams (Viazi Vikuu).primary_prep: Dig very deep holes (up to 1 meter) and fill with topsoil/manure.
Yams (Viazi Vikuu).secondary_prep: Not required for the whole field.
Yams (Viazi Vikuu).tertiary_prep: Plant setts in the holes. Immediately provide a strong, tall stake for the vine to climb.

Sunflower (Alizeti).description: An oilseed crop that is highly drought tolerant.

Soya Beans.description: A high-protein legume used for human and animal feed.
Soya Beans.seedbed_prep: Inoculate seeds with Rhizobium bacteria before planting.

Pigeon Peas (Mbaazi).description: A perennial legume that acts as a windbreak and nitrogen fixer.
Pigeon Peas (Mbaazi).tertiary_prep: Plant 1m by 1m. Often intercropped with maize.

Simsim (Sesame).description: An oil crop grown in Western and Coastal regions.
Simsim (Sesame).secondary_prep: Harrow to an extra fine tilth.
Simsim (Sesame).tertiary_prep: Mix tiny seeds with sand and broadcast, or drill in shallow rows.

Millet (Wimbi).secondary_prep: Harrow to a very fine tilth.

Boma Rhodes Grass.description: The most common pasture grass for livestock farmers.
Boma Rhodes Grass.seedbed_prep: Wait for the onset of rains.
Boma Rhodes Grass.secondary_prep: Harrow to an extremely fine tilth.
Boma Rhodes Grass.tertiary_prep: Broadcast seeds and pull a leafy tree branch over the field to cover the seeds very lightly.

Mahindi (Maize).description: Chakula kikuu cha Kenya. Inahitaji udongo wenye rutuba unaopitisha maji vizuri.
Mahindi (Maize).seedbed_prep: Safisha shamba kwa kuondoa mabaki ya mazao yaliyopita. Usichome mabaki haya; badala yake, yafukie kwenye udongo ili kuongeza rutuba.
Mahindi (Maize).primary_prep: Kulima kwa kina (sm 15-20) ukitumia jembe la ng'ombe au trekta. Hii husaidia mizizi kupenya kwa urahisi na kupata maji wakati wa kiangazi.
Mahindi (Maize).secondary_prep: Kuvunja mabonge (Harrowing) ili kupata udongo wa kati. Mahindi hayahitaji udongo uliolainika sana, lakini mabonge makubwa yavunjwe.
Mahindi (Maize).tertiary_prep: Kutengeneza matuta na mistari. Weka nafasi ya sm 75 kati ya mistari na sm 30 kati ya mashina. Weka mbolea ya DAP wakati wa kupanda.

Maharagwe (Beans).description: Zao muhimu la jamii ya mikunde kwa chakula na kuongeza naitrojeni kwenye udongo.
Maharagwe (Beans).seedbed_prep: Chagua shamba ambalo halituamishi maji. Maharagwe huoza mizizi haraka sana kwenye maji yaliyotuama.
Maharagwe (Beans).primary_prep: Kulima kwa kina cha kati (sm 10-15). Fudikiza magugu yote chini ya udongo. Weka chokaa ya kilimo (lime) kama udongo una asidi nyingi.
Maharagwe (Beans).secondary_prep: Kuvunja mabonge hadi udongo uwe LAINI SANA. Udongo laini unasaidia mbegu kuchipua kwa urahisi.
Maharagwe (Beans).tertiary_prep: Panda kwenye matuta madogo au ardhi tambarare. Nafasi iwe sm 45 kati ya mistari na sm 15 kati ya mimea.

Viazi Mbatata (Potatoes).description: Zao kuu la biashara na chakula katika maeneo yenye baridi.
Viazi Mbatata (Potatoes).seedbed_prep: Hakikisha shamba halikupandwa nyanya au hoho msimu uliopita ili kuzuia ugonjwa wa kunyauka.
Viazi Mbatata (Potatoes).primary_prep: Kulima kwa kina (sm 20) ni muhimu kuruhusu viazi kupanuka chini ya ardhi.
Viazi Mbatata (Potatoes).secondary_prep: Vunja mabonge kiasi. Epuka udongo laini sana ambao unaweza kusababisha maji kutuama.
Viazi Mbatata (Potatoes).tertiary_prep: Tengeneza matuta marefu. Panda mbegu zenye chipukizi sm 30 kutoka shina hadi shina. Weka mbolea ya NPK.

Mtama (Sorghum).description: Nafaka inayostahimili ukame sana, nzuri kwa maeneo kame.
Mtama (Sorghum).seedbed_prep: Ondoa magugu yote kabisa kwani mtama mchanga hushindwa kupambana na magugu.
Mtama (Sorghum).primary_prep: Lima mapema kabla ya mvua ili kuruhusu magugu kukauka na kufa.
Mtama (Sorghum).secondary_prep: Lainisha udongo UWE LAINI SANA. Mbegu za mtama ni ndogo sana; mabonge makubwa yatazifukia kina kirefu.
Mtama (Sorghum).tertiary_prep: Panda kwenye mistari yenye kina kifupi. Nafasi iwe sm 60 kwa sm 20.

Muhogo (Cassava).description: Zao la mizizi linalojulikana kwa uvumilivu wake katika udongo duni na ukame.
Muhogo (Cassava).seedbed_prep: Safisha vichaka na visiki vya miti.
Muhogo (Cassava).primary_prep: Lima kwa kina ili kulegeza udongo kwa mizizi kupenya.
Muhogo (Cassava).tertiary_prep: Tengeneza matuta makubwa. Panda vipande vya sm 30 kwa pembe ya digrii 45, nafasi ya mita 1 kwa mita 1.

Nyanya (Tomatoes).description: Zao la mboga lenye thamani kubwa linalohitaji uangalizi wa karibu.
Nyanya (Tomatoes).seedbed_prep: Anzia kitaluni. Punguza vijidudu kwenye udongo wa kitalu kwa kutumia joto la jua.
Nyanya (Tomatoes).primary_prep: Shamba kuu linahitaji kulimwa kwa kina na kuwekwa samadi iliyooza vizuri.
Nyanya (Tomatoes).secondary_prep: Lainisha udongo sana. Tengeneza matuta yaliyoinuka ikiwa eneo linatuama maji.
Nyanya (Tomatoes).tertiary_prep: Hamishia miche baada ya wiki 4. Nafasi sm 60 kwa sm 45. Weka miti ya kuegemeza mmea mara moja.

Kabeji (Cabbage).description: Mboga za majani zinazopendwa zinazostawi kwenye baridi na unyevu.
Kabeji (Cabbage).seedbed_prep: Panda kitaluni. Kinga miche dhidi ya mvua kubwa na jua kali.
Kabeji (Cabbage).primary_prep: Lima na uweke kiasi kikubwa cha mbolea ya samadi.
Kabeji (Cabbage).tertiary_prep: Hamishia miche shambani. Nafasi sm 60 kwa sm 60. Hakikisha udongo una unyevu kila wakati.

Vitunguu (Onions).description: Zao la biashara linalohitaji hali ya ukame wakati wa kuvuna.
Vitunguu (Onions).seedbed_prep: Panda mbegu kitaluni kwenye udongo laini.
Vitunguu (Onions).primary_prep: Lima kwa kina cha wastani. Vitunguu vina mizizi mifupi.
Vitunguu (Onions).secondary_prep: Lainisha udongo sana ili mizizi ishikike vizuri.
Vitunguu (Onions).tertiary_prep: Hamishia miche ikiwa na unene wa penseli. Nafasi sm 30 kati ya mistari na sm 10 kati ya mimea. Usipande kina kirefu.

Ngwaci (Sweet Potatoes).description: Zao muhimu la chakula, lenye Vitamini A nyingi.
Ngwaci (Sweet Potatoes).seedbed_prep: Safisha uoto uliopo. Epuka maeneo yanayotuama maji.
Ngwaci (Sweet Potatoes).tertiary_prep: Tengeneza matuta marefu sana (sm 30-40 juu). Panda marando (vines) yasiyo na magonjwa kwa kulaza.

Ndengu (Green Grams).description: Kunde zinazokomaa haraka na kufanya vizuri maeneo kavu.
Ndengu (Green Grams).seedbed_prep: Safisha shamba na usubiri mvua za kwanza.
Ndengu (Green Grams).secondary_prep: Lainisha udongo kwa ajili ya mbegu ndogo.
Ndengu (Green Grams).tertiary_prep: Panda sm 45 kati ya mistari na sm 15 kati ya mimea.

Kunde (Cowpeas).description: Hulimwa kwa majani na mbegu zake. Huvumilia ukame sana.
Kunde (Cowpeas).seedbed_prep: Kusafisha shamba kawaida. Inaweza kupandwa pamoja na mahindi.
Kunde (Cowpeas).tertiary_prep: Panda mbegu kina cha sm 2-3. Nafasi inategemea kama unataka majani au mbegu.

Sukuma Wiki (Kales).primary_prep: Lima na weka mbolea nyingi ya samadi.
Sukuma Wiki (Kales).tertiary_prep: Hamishia miche baada ya wiki 4. Nafasi sm 60 kwa sm 60. Weka mbolea ya kukuzia (CAN) baada ya wiki 3.

Njugu Karanga (Groundnuts).description: Zao la biashara linalohitaji udongo tifutifu kulegeza ili karanga ziingie chini.
Njugu Karanga (Groundnuts).seedbed_prep: Chagua udongo mwepesi. Udongo wa mfinyanzi huzuia karanga kukua chini ya ardhi.
Njugu Karanga (Groundnuts).tertiary_prep: Panda mbegu sm 5 chini. Nafasi sm 45 kwa sm 15. Usipalilie mmea unapoanza kutoa maua.

Ndizi (Bananas).description: Zao la kudumu linalotumika kama tunda na chakula.
Ndizi (Bananas).seedbed_prep: Chagua eneo lililokingwa na upepo mkali.
Ndizi (Bananas).primary_prep: Lima eneo lote, ingawa kuandaa mashimo tu ndio jambo la kawaida.
Ndizi (Bananas).secondary_prep: Sio lazima sana kwa shamba zima.
Ndizi (Bananas).tertiary_prep: Chimba mashimo makubwa (sm 60x60x60). Changanya udongo wa juu na samadi. Panda miche bora.

Karoti (Carrots).description: Mboga ya mzizi inayohitaji udongo mrefu na uliolegea.
Karoti (Carrots).primary_prep: Lima kwa kina KIREFU SANA. USITUMIE samadi mbichi kwani husababisha karoti kupasuka mizizi.
Karoti (Carrots).secondary_prep: Lainisha udongo uwe laini sana kama unga.
Karoti (Carrots).tertiary_prep: Panda mbegu moja kwa moja kwenye mistari sm 30. Punguza miche ibaki nafasi ya sm 5 kuruhusu mzizi kukua.

Ngano (Wheat).description: Nafaka kuu inayolimwa kwa wingi katika Bonde la Ufa.
Ngano (Wheat).seedbed_prep: Ondoa mabaki ya nafaka ya msimu uliopita kuzuia magonjwa.
Ngano (Wheat).secondary_prep: Lainisha udongo uwe laini na mgumu kiasi. Udongo mgumu husaidia mbegu kuota vizuri.
Ngano (Wheat).tertiary_prep: Panda kwa mashine (seed drill) kina cha sm 3-5. Weka mbolea ya kupandia yenye Fosforasi.

Mchele / Mpunga (Rice).description: Nafaka inayotegemea maji mengi kama vile Mwea.
Mchele / Mpunga (Rice).seedbed_prep: Tengeneza kitalu chenye maji. Loweka mbegu kwa saa 24 kabla ya kupanda kitaluni.
Mchele / Mpunga (Rice).primary_prep: Lima shamba likiwa limejaa maji kutengeneza tope zito linalozuia maji kupotea chini.
Mchele / Mpunga (Rice).secondary_prep: Sawazisha shamba sawasawa ukitumia ubao unaovutwa na ng'ombe au trekta.
Mchele / Mpunga (Rice).tertiary_prep: Hamishia miche ya wiki 3-4 kwenye shamba la tope. Nafasi sm 20 kwa sm 20.

Miwa (Sugarcane).description: Zao kuu la biashara Magharibi na Nyanza.
Miwa (Sugarcane).seedbed_prep: Safisha uoto wote. Hakikisha shamba linapitisha maji vizuri kwani miwa huchukia maji kutuama.
Miwa (Sugarcane).primary_prep: Lima kwa kina (hadi sm 30) kuruhusu mizizi mikubwa kushika chini.
Miwa (Sugarcane).secondary_prep: Vunja mabonge mara moja au mbili.
Miwa (Sugarcane).tertiary_prep: Chimba mitaro mirefu mita 1.2 hadi 1.5. Panda vipande vya miwa (setts) kwa kulaza ndani ya mtaro.

Majani Chai (Tea).description: Zao linaloingiza pesa nyingi za kigeni Kenya, hustawi nyanda za juu kwenye udongo wa asidi.
Majani Chai (Tea).seedbed_prep: Safisha misitu. Usichome majani kwani majivu hupunguza asidi ya udongo (chai inahitaji asidi).
Majani Chai (Tea).primary_prep: Lima kwa kina kuvunja udongo mgumu chini.
Majani Chai (Tea).secondary_prep: Sawazisha shamba na panda miti ya kivuli na kuzuia upepo.
Majani Chai (Tea).tertiary_prep: Chimba mashimo sm 45. Panda miche ya kisasa. Nafasi mita 1.2 kwa mita 0.6.

Kahawa (Coffee).description: Zao la biashara linalopenda udongo wa volkeno na hali ya hewa ya baridi kiasi.
Kahawa (Coffee).seedbed_prep: Tengeneza kitalu chenye kivuli. Mbegu huchukua hadi miezi 2 kuota.
Kahawa (Coffee).primary_prep: Safisha shamba na lima kwa kina.
Kahawa (Coffee).secondary_prep: Weka alama shambani. Tengeneza matuta kwenye miteremko kuzuia mmonyoko.
Kahawa (Coffee).tertiary_prep: Chimba mashimo sm 60 upana na kina. Changanya udongo na mbolea ya samadi kabla ya kupanda.

Pamba (Cotton).description: Zao la nyuzi linalostawi maeneo ya joto na kavu.
Pamba (Cotton).seedbed_prep: Safisha shamba mara baada ya kuvuna msimu uliopita kuua wadudu (cotton stainers).
Pamba (Cotton).primary_prep: Lima kwa kina cha wastani kufukia mabaki ya mimea.
Pamba (Cotton).tertiary_prep: Panda mbegu 3-4 kwa shimo. Nafasi sm 90 kwa sm 30. Punguza ibaki mimea 2 ikishaota.

Pireto (Pyrethrum).description: Maua yanayotumika kutengeneza dawa asili za wadudu.
Pireto (Pyrethrum).seedbed_prep: Ondoa magugu yote. Pireto inashindwa kupambana na magugu.
Pireto (Pyrethrum).tertiary_prep: Panda vipande (splits) kutoka kwenye mimea iliyokomaa. Nafasi sm 60 kwa sm 30 kwenye matuta.

Makadamia (Macadamia Nuts).description: Mti unaotoa njugu za thamani kubwa.
Makadamia (Macadamia Nuts).seedbed_prep: Nunua miche iliyounganishwa (grafted) kutoka vitalu vilivyothibitishwa pekee.
Makadamia (Macadamia Nuts).primary_prep: Safisha shamba na weka alama za mashimo.
Makadamia (Macadamia Nuts).tertiary_prep: Chimba mashimo makubwa (sm 60x60). Nafasi mita 7 kwa mita 7 kuruhusu mti kutanuka.

Parachichi (Avocado).description: Tunda linalouzwa nje kwa wingi, hasa aina ya Hass.
Parachichi (Avocado).seedbed_prep: Chagua eneo lisilotuama maji. Parachichi huoza mizizi haraka sana.
Parachichi (Avocado).primary_prep: Safisha shamba na lima kuvunja udongo mgumu.
Parachichi (Avocado).tertiary_prep: Chimba mashimo sm 60 kina. Nafasi mita 5 kwa mita 5. Changanya udongo na samadi na panda miche iliyounganishwa.

Maembe (Mangoes).description: Tunda linalopendwa sana, hasa maeneo ya Mashariki na Pwani.
Maembe (Mangoes).seedbed_prep: Chagua udongo wenye kina kirefu usiotuama maji.
Maembe (Mangoes).tertiary_prep: Chimba mashimo makubwa. Nafasi inatofautiana kati ya mita 8x8 hadi 10x10 kutegemea aina.

Matunda ya Mateso (Passion Fruit).description: Mmea unaotambaa na kutoa matunda yenye thamani kubwa.
Matunda ya Mateso (Passion Fruit).seedbed_prep: Jenga fensi za waya (trellises) za mmea kutambaa kabla ya kupanda.
Matunda ya Mateso (Passion Fruit).primary_prep: Lima eneo kati ya mistari ya fensi.
Matunda ya Mateso (Passion Fruit).tertiary_prep: Panda miche kwenye shina la nguzo za fensi, nafasi ya mita 3.

Mananasi (Pineapples).description: Tunda la kitropiki linalofaa kwa maeneo ya joto na chini.
Mananasi (Pineapples).seedbed_prep: Tumia machipukizi (suckers au crowns) kutoka kwa mimea yenye afya.
Mananasi (Pineapples).primary_prep: Lima kwa kina. Udongo lazima upitishe maji vizuri sana.
Mananasi (Pineapples).tertiary_prep: Panda mistari miwili miwili. Nafasi sm 30 kati ya mimea na sm 60 kati ya mistari. Tumia karatasi nyeusi kufunika udongo (mulch) ikiwezekana.

Papai (Pawpaw).description: Mti wa matunda unaokua haraka na kuishi muda mfupi.
Papai (Pawpaw).seedbed_prep: Otesha mbegu kwenye viriba vya nailoni kitaluni.
Papai (Pawpaw).tertiary_prep: Panda miche 3 kwa shimo (kuhakikisha unapata mmea dume na jike baadaye). Nafasi mita 3 kwa mita 3.

Tikiti Maji (Watermelon).description: Tunda linalotambaa, linahitaji joto na nafasi kubwa.
Tikiti Maji (Watermelon).seedbed_prep: Safisha shamba na subiri udongo upate joto.
Tikiti Maji (Watermelon).primary_prep: Lima kwa kina kuruhusu mizizi kwenda chini.
Tikiti Maji (Watermelon).tertiary_prep: Panda mbegu 2-3 kwa shimo kwenye matuta. Nafasi mita 2 kwa mita 1.

Maboga (Pumpkins).description: Mmea unaostahimili magonjwa, hulimwa kwa matunda na majani.
Maboga (Pumpkins).tertiary_prep: Panda kwenye matuta. Weka mbolea nyingi ya asili kabla ya kupanda mbegu.

Mishiri (French Beans).description: Mboga inayouzwa nje, inahitaji uangalizi wa karibu sana.
Mishiri (French Beans).seedbed_prep: Hakikisha mifumo ya umwagiliaji ipo tayari kabla ya kupanda.
Mishiri (French Beans).secondary_prep: Lainisha udongo uwe laini sana ili mbegu ziote pamoja.
Mishiri (French Beans).tertiary_prep: Panda mbegu moja kwa moja. Nafasi sm 30 kwa sm 15. Weka kamba za kushikilia mmea.

Njegere (Snow Peas).description: Zao la kuuza nje linalostawi maeneo ya baridi.
Njegere (Snow Peas).tertiary_prep: Panda mbegu. Weka miti au kamba mara moja kwani ni mimea inayotambaa.

Minji (Garden Peas).description: Mboga inayopendwa inayolimwa nyanda za juu zenye baridi.
Minji (Garden Peas).seedbed_prep: Safisha shamba kuondoa mabaki ya mazao.
Minji (Garden Peas).tertiary_prep: Panda mbegu kwenye mistari yenye nafasi ya sm 45.

Pilipili Hoho (Capsicum / Bell Peppers).description: Mboga inayolimwa sana ndani ya kitalu (greenhouse) na nje.
Pilipili Hoho (Capsicum / Bell Peppers).primary_prep: Lima kwa kina na weka samadi iliyooza vizuri.
Pilipili Hoho (Capsicum / Bell Peppers).tertiary_prep: Hamishia miche baada ya wiki 6. Nafasi sm 60 kwa sm 45.

Pilipili Kali (Chilies).description: Zao la viungo linalostahimili wadudu wengi.
Pilipili Kali (Chilies).tertiary_prep: Hamishia miche. Nafasi sm 60 kwa sm 60.

Kitunguu Saumu (Garlic).description: Kiungo chenye thamani kubwa lakini huchukua muda mrefu kukomaa.
Kitunguu Saumu (Garlic).seedbed_prep: Gawanya vitunguu kupata punje za kupanda. Usimenye maganda ya punje.
Kitunguu Saumu (Garlic).primary_prep: Lima kwa kina kulegeza udongo kwa ajili ya vitunguu kupanuka.
Kitunguu Saumu (Garlic).tertiary_prep: Panda punje upande wenye ncha ukiangalia juu, sm 3 chini. Nafasi sm 30 kwa sm 10.

Tangawizi (Ginger).description: Zao la kiungo la mizizi lenye faida kubwa.
Tangawizi (Ginger).seedbed_prep: Tumia vipande vya mizizi (setts) vyenye angalau jicho moja.
Tangawizi (Ginger).primary_prep: Lima kwa kina na weka mbolea nyingi ya asili.
Tangawizi (Ginger).tertiary_prep: Panda sm 5 chini kwenye matuta. Funika udongo na majani makavu (mulch) mara moja.

Dania (Coriander).seedbed_prep: Vunja mbegu za duara ziwe nusu mbili kabla ya kupanda ili ziote haraka.
Dania (Coriander).secondary_prep: Lainisha udongo uwe laini sana kama unga.
Dania (Coriander).tertiary_prep: Nyunyiza mbegu au panda kwenye mistari sm 30.

Mchicha (Spinach).description: Mboga ya majani yenye virutubisho vingi.
Mchicha (Spinach).seedbed_prep: Anzia kitaluni au panda moja kwa moja.
Mchicha (Spinach).primary_prep: Lima na weka mbolea ya asili.
Mchicha (Spinach).tertiary_prep: Kama umepanda moja kwa moja, punguza mimea ibaki nafasi ya sm 15.

Terere (Amaranth).description: Mboga ya kienyeji inayo stahimili ukame na ina virutubisho vingi.
Terere (Amaranth).secondary_prep: Lainisha udongo uwe laini SANA kwani mbegu zake ni ndogo sana.
Terere (Amaranth).tertiary_prep: Changanya mbegu na mchanga mkavu kabla ya kunyunyiza ili zisambae vizuri.

Saga / Saget (Spider Plant).description: Mboga ya kienyeji yenye uchungu unaopendwa na wengi.
Saga / Saget (Spider Plant).tertiary_prep: Nyunyiza mbegu au panda mistari sm 30.

Managu (Nightshade).description: Mboga ya kienyeji inayosakwa sana sokoni.
Managu (Nightshade).seedbed_prep: Tengeneza kitalu. Mbegu huchukua muda mrefu kuota.
Managu (Nightshade).tertiary_prep: Hamishia miche baada ya wiki 4. Nafasi sm 30 kwa sm 30.

Nduma (Arrowroots).description: Zao la mizizi la asili linalolimwa kwenye mabonde na maeneo ya maji.
Nduma (Arrowroots).seedbed_prep: Chagua maeneo yenye majimaji au mabwawa.
Nduma (Arrowroots).primary_prep: Chimba kwa kina ukitumia jembe la mkono. Epuka matrekta kwenye tope.
Nduma (Arrowroots).tertiary_prep: Chimba mitaro mirefu. Panda machipukizi (suckers) ndani ya mtaro na kufunika kidogo.

Viazi Vikuu (Yams).description: Zao la mizizi linalotambaa na kuhitaji udongo mrefu.
Viazi Vikuu (Yams).seedbed_prep: Kata viazi vilivyokomaa vipande vipande na chovya kwenye majivu kuzuia kuoza.
Viazi Vikuu (Yams).primary_prep: Chimba mashimo marefu sana (hadi mita 1) na ujaze udongo wa juu na samadi.
Viazi Vikuu (Yams).tertiary_prep: Panda vipande ndani ya shimo. Weka mti mrefu na imara mara moja ili mmea utambae.

Alizeti (Sunflower).description: Zao la mafuta linalostahimili ukame sana.
Alizeti (Sunflower).tertiary_prep: Panda mbegu moja kwa moja. Nafasi sm 75 kwa sm 30.

Soya (Soya Beans).description: Kunde yenye protini nyingi kwa chakula cha binadamu na wanyama.
Soya (Soya Beans).seedbed_prep: Changanya mbegu na bakteria wa Rhizobium kabla ya kupanda.

Mbaazi (Pigeon Peas).description: Kunde ya kudumu inayotumika kuzuia upepo na kuongeza naitrojeni.
Mbaazi (Pigeon Peas).tertiary_prep: Panda mita 1 kwa mita 1. Mara nyingi hupandwa pamoja na mahindi.

Ufuta (Simsim / Sesame).description: Zao la mafuta linalolimwa Magharibi na Pwani.
Ufuta (Simsim / Sesame).tertiary_prep: Changanya mbegu ndogo na mchanga kisha nyunyiza, au panda mistari midogo.

Wimbi (Millet).description: Nafaka yenye virutubisho vingi inayokwepa ukame.
Wimbi (Millet).tertiary_prep: Nyunyiza au panda mbegu sm 2 chini.

Nyasi za Boma Rhodes (Boma Rhodes Grass).description: Nyasi zinazopendwa sana na wafugaji kwa malisho.
Nyasi za Boma Rhodes (Boma Rhodes Grass).secondary_prep: Lainisha udongo uwe LAINI SANA KABISA.
Nyasi za Boma Rhodes (Boma Rhodes Grass).tertiary_prep: Nyunyiza mbegu kisha vuta tawi la mti lenye majani juu ya shamba kufunika mbegu kidogo sana.
